meanings.definition: A thick, creamy dressing or sauce typically made from oil, vinegar, and egg yolks.
meanings.sent1: I love to put mayonnaise on my sandwich for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The mayonnaise in the salad was delicious and added a creamy texture.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tomato blush? Because it saw the salad dressing changing into mayonnaise!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as smooth as mayonnaise, spreading warmth to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The mayonnaise dripped slowly from the spoon, like a creamy waterfall.

meanings.definition: To spread or mix with mayonnaise.
meanings.sent1: I will mayonnaise the bread before adding the chicken for the sandwich.
meanings.sent2: She mayonnaises the pasta salad to give it a rich and creamy taste.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to mayonnaise the cake batter for a unique twist.
meanings.sent4: The artist mayonnaised the colors on the canvas, creating a beautiful blend.
meanings.sent5: He mayonnaises the ingredients together with precision, like a culinary maestro.
